title: Freewheeling Podcast: The women’s Tour de France is happening, but will it succeed?
content:
The Dutch and French Olympic teams have been announced and a better picture of the Olympic road race is coming together.

Plus, with the news of the women’s Tour de France happening in 2022, Loren, Amy, and Abby have some thoughts. 

The post Freewheeling Podcast: The women’s Tour de France is happening, but will it succeed? appeared first on CyclingTips.
author: Abby Mickey
